0010100111110011 1000001101110011 1 -> sum: 1010110101100111, cout: 0
0010010101100100 0110011010010000 1 -> sum: 1000101111110101, cout: 0
0110101101111011 1110101000011101 0 -> sum: 0101010110011000, cout: 1
1000110100011010 0100110111101010 0 -> sum: 1101101100000100, cout: 0
1001100101010101 0000110101011111 1 -> sum: 1010011010110101, cout: 0
0111000101100111 1010000010110111 1 -> sum: 0001001000011111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
